duties_responsibilities.duty: Accurately complete orders according to Standard Operating Procedures.
Pick and pack products for shipment following prescribed procedures.
Operate fork-lift and side-loader to move product.
Follow all safety procedures and wear required Personal Protective Equipment (PPE).
Keep the distribution area clean and organized.
Support Continuous Improvement and Lean Culture by standardizing work and participating in problem-solving and Kaizen teams.
Submit suggestions to improve Safety, Quality, Delivery, Cost, and Productivity.
Strive to sustain and improve the 5S Workplace Organization (Scan/Sort, Set-in-Order, Shine, Standardize, and Sustain).
